_source.text: 2.41pm: "It's common thing to say that Premier League this season was not just more prolific but also better than the 2010-11 edition," writes Admir Pajic.

text: 2.41pm: "It's common thing to say that **Premier** **League** this **season** was not just more prolific but
also **better** **than** the 2010-11 edition," writes Admir Pajic.
